Consumer & Builder

Consumers want to make progress in their lives with the products they use. They do not care much about the name, people who built it or fancy designs. Consumers want to eat better, sleep better, take care of their families, and feel happy.

Builders want to ensure consumers are making progress in this chaotic world. Product managers owe it to their consumers, expressing them their gratitude and showing empathy for pain consumers are feeling.

Tools

What is the best tool available for a builder people to do his or her job?

Asking questions.

The true function of a builder is to peel the onion of consumer's needs. It is the best and underutilized tool.
